mapper.select: select s.id,s.stuId,s.reason, s.mydate,s.checked,s.classNum,a1.category,s.classId from course.StudentApplication s left join Application_Category a1 on s.states = a1.id where s.id =#{id}
mapper.update: update course.StudentApplication set checked = #{checked} where id=#{id} and checked=2 -- 只有未审核的才能改变状态
